Name: Ignited Seed of Life
Desc: A condensed pile of burning matter obtained from the body of a defeated Avatar of Lava.\nIt emits a slight heat.\nAttempting to stop a stone pile of this size from incessantly burning away would be a hard task indeed. It is said that this is some primordial form of life.
JumpDescs: Dropped by Lv. 40+ Avatars of Lava
